div.p: NARRATOR: Defense mechanisms, another component of psychological dependence, also become stronger in the Red Phase.
NARRATOR: As the alcohol or drug use is becoming more destructive, the defense mechanisms have to become more complicated and more deeply entrenched to work. And they do work.
NARRATOR: By the Red Phase, psychological dependence has progressed to a point at which few people are capable of overcoming it on their own.
NARRATOR: So, people in the Red Phase will often benefit from help either from counselors trained in addictions, or from people who have been there themselves and are now in recovery.
